items.text: too much width outside off, wide called and rightly so. Losing his radar that time
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, 1 wide

items.text: gets half a stride in and bunts this length ball into the off side
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, no run

items.text: defended back, bowler puts his left hand to stop on his followthrough
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, no run

items.text: lovely on-drive but can't pick the gap, straight to mid-on
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, no run

items.text: beaten as he looks to punch away from the body, hint of outswing and the length that nearly did him in
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, no run

items.text: off a thick edge, a first slip would've gobbled it up for brunch. Instead, it flies to the third man boundary. Squared up, looked to play through midwicket but the ball tailed away late
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, FOUR runs

items.text: thumped back, but disturbs the stumps at the bowler's end. Hit too straight
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Stirling, no run

items.text: punches this length delivery to extra cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Stirling, no run

items.text: slips in a length ball on middle, defended back
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Stirling, no run

items.text: thumps this on the up to cover point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Stirling, no run

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, Stirling kept honest as he defends with soft hands
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Stirling, no run

items.text: firm push but straight to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Stirling, no run

items.text: lovely shot! Oozing class and confidence. Can pay to watch. Width and he unfurls his wrists to pick the gap behind point
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, FOUR runs

items.text: straighter and he works this into the gap at midwicket
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, 2 runs

items.text: keeps a touch low, defended back
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, no run

items.text: end of a promising innings. And what a terrible way to go. Looks to take on the short ball but this doesn't come on and he's through with the stroke, cramped for room. Did he get a little globve on the way through to Mushfiqur? No conclusive proof. Given out so he has to go. Oh, there's no review. How unfortunate? Richard Kettleborough the umpire in question.
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Balbirnie, OUT

dismissal.text: A Balbirnie c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Abu Jayed 20 (20b 4x4 0x6) SR: 100.00

items.text: pacy first ball, defends from the crease
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Porterfield, no run

items.text: slips a full ball on the pads, flicked to deep square
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: defended from the crease
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Porterfield, no run

items.text: floats this full and across, left alone
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Porterfield, no run

items.text: chipped but just wide of midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Porterfield, 1 run

items.text: balance, poise and wrist work - all top notch as he whips this incoming length ball into the gap at midwicket. Quality
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Stirling, FOUR runs

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, defended
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Stirling, no run

items.text: gentle bunt down to square third man for an easy single
items.postText: Time for a change in commentary. Sreshth is back
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: eased to long off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Stirling, 1 run
